scripts.postinstall: yarn run concurrently "cd react && yarn install" "cd electron && yarn install"
scripts.start: yarn run concurrently "cd react && yarn start" "cd electron && yarn run electron ."
scripts.build:electron: rm -rf .tmp-app && mkdir .tmp-app && rsync -av --progress electron/ .tmp-app --exclude node_modules && cd .tmp-app && yarn install --only=production && rm dev.html && rm yarn.lock && rm -f yarn-error.log && rm -f .DS_STORE && mv -f index.prod.js index.js
scripts.build:react: rm -rf .tmp-react-build && mkdir .tmp-react-build && rsync -av --progress react/ .tmp-react-build --exclude node_modules && cd .tmp-react-build && yarn install --only=production && yarn build && cp -r build ../.tmp-app
scripts.build:prepare: yarn run concurrently "yarn build:electron" "yarn build:react" && cd .tmp-app && find . -name ".DS_Store" -delete
